message.body: A guy with a puppy just got on the elevator with me and the puppy snuggled up on my feet and rubbed my legs and I said hi puppy and he jumped up on me and then I asked if I could pet him and the guy said of course and so I pet the puppy and then I had to get off the elevator and he tried to come with me and he was a baby Boston terrier named bubba and now im crying.
Awh babyyy puppyyyyy :( now I'm gonna cry
So. If we do do this new York thing... I might have to killl kk. Just a heads up
Bc she's gonna have to take a piss every hour bro. It's gonna take a five year carride to get there.
Yeah. Cause of her whole new diet. It quite literally goes right through you when you only eat fruit and vegetables
Gross. She needs to eat some fucking bacon.
Humans aren't built to eat only plants dude.
I could spike her goddamn smoothies with meat omg.
Hahahaha shed probs get sick from it at this point.
And she keeps telling me "there's going to be so many vegan opportunities in New York!" And I'm like omg shoot me.
lol she got the pocketbook to back that up? Vegan eatin in nyc is for the penthouse living aristocrats.
Haha haha lol she gonna starve
